contents: Article 1 (Purpose) The purpose of this corporation is to contribute to the stabilization of life and welfare of the people by reasonably and efficiently carrying out business under the provisions of the National Pension Act and the Enforcement Decree of the National Pension Act under the entrustment of the Minister of Health and Welfare. Do this. Revised 2009. 6. 23., 2010. 3. 30., 2014. 12. 29.
